EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Sterling , I am sorry we have had trouble connecting. Now might not be the right time for you. You may find some of the resources we develop specifically designed for independent consultants helpful for you: - Recorded Independent Consulting Webinar Index <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index> - Reports on Independent Consulting in America <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/> - Independent Consulting Brief Monthly <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief> Any update would be great, you may simply reply to this email. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, September 25, 2012 3:12 PM To: 'sterling.t.hayden@gmail.com' Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Sterling, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on my email below. Are you still interested in learning more about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you have a moment. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcp0t%2F5fvXNuflnizEf5aIvLF8APuo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcp0t%2F5fvXNuflnizEf5aIvLF8APuo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, September 18, 2012 4:39 PM To: 'sterling.t.hayden@gmail.com' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Sterling, Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Stefanie Hayden. Stefanie has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcp0t%2F5fvXNuflnizEf5aIvLF8APuo0cAzsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to see if it is something that you might find valuable.
